# rlR: Reinforcement learning in R

## Installation
```{r}
devtools::install_github("smilesun/rlR", dependencies = TRUE)
```

## Usage
```{r}
library(rlR)
env = makeGymEnv("CartPole-v0")
listAvailAgent()
```


```{r fig.path="inst/figure"}
agent = makeAgent("AgentDQN", env)
agent$updatePara("console", FALSE)
system.time({
# perf = agent$learn(500)  # uncomment this to run, which might take some time
})
# perf$plot()
```
